name: Daniel Williams
text: Will not be doing business here. I needed some water for my truck. Owner said he didn’t have any to go to a gas station. Highly disappointed with these people.

resp.text: I'm the owner and I know you didn't speak to me, because I would've gladly given you water.

name: Jason Hubbard
text: These guys are AMAZING! They are extremely knowledgeable about all of the products they sell and the services they offer. I was very surprised at the hometown feel of the shop and the friendliness of everyone there. They are able to take care of any tire needs you have from high performance cars to rock crawling 4 wheel drives. The shop is set up to handle any and all off road performance needs that anyone can have. It is very easy for me to say that after my experience with this wonderful group of gentleman that I will never go anywhere to buy tires again. I was impressed enough with them that my search for a Jeep to build is in high gear now. I'm looking forward to seeing what they can do with it. The best advice I can give to everyone is to check them out for any and all tire needs.

name: Jason Meeder
text: These guys are great! Amazing customer service,  professionalism,  and they treat you like you matter. Appreciate all they've done for me and always are priced to compete!

name: Frank Smith
text: Great people doing great work.

name: Will H.
text: Couldn’t be happier with these guys. Fast, Honest, Great work, and great prices. I’ll definitely be back here! Coolest guys I’ve met in a really long time too!

text: been using these guys for years and years. great place. thers a man named Jack here who has forgotten more about drivelines and differentials than your driveline man  ever known. don't spend 2 hours changing that next baering. go see Jack and watch him do it in 3 minutes.

name: Andrew Mahan
text: Great place! A place a guy would stay for hrs looking at the different trailer parts lol. Bruce was very nice along with guys that works in the shop area. He has very good group of guys.

name: Charles Alsabrook
text: Experienced, friendly staff.

name: Mike Mahoney
text: My travel trailer had a wheel bearing go out. Before I realized it, I ruined my axle. I called around and everyone recommended Bruce at AL Auto Carriage. They were fast, reasonable, and very accommodating. I would definitely recommend them and their amazing service.

name: Michael Ashworth
text:
SKIP THE MIDDLE MAN !!  Other commercial places get hard to find parts from here and charge you double for it .
Great hometown folks here . I have been coming in here for more years than i can remember.  They have most anything you would need for truck accessories, trailer parts,axles,LED lights,  boat wheels with tires etc . They also have all the strapping ,chains ,binders you would want for a trucking company.
They also do installs of work boxes, hitches and more . Im sure they would customize something to fit your needs.
It's a little old building , but has stood the test of time . Its a place that makes you feel good when you step into the door.
Just ask to speak with Bruce and you'll see what I mean !

name: Michael Findley
text: Great service.

name: Louis Campbell
text: The only place that works on my trailer. Bruce always goes out the way to help out. Great group of guys!

name: Eric The traveling scuba diving bugman
text: Great selection of parts and knowledgeable staff. Good prices.

name: Johnnie Gray
text: Very good service if you every ask for Bruce

name: silas bonner
text: Thought they were open to 5 but after multiple calls there was no answer

name: William Wheat
text: Lots of trailer parts

name: Miller Bonds
text: I recently bought a used motor for one of my Isuzu box trucks. It was a great price compared to buying something new and definitely saved me a few thousand. Everyone there was extremely easy to work with. Would 100% recommend.

name: Jonathon Passero
text: I don’t know how I would keep my trucks rolling with out these guys. They have all the parts you need and trucks, for the right price. Estes is my go to guy up at AWB, he always hooks me up with the right stuff.

name: Chris Evans
text: I wouldn’t recommend buying anything from here.  We bought a box truck from these guys and had nothing but problems from day one m they didn’t want to help us at all. We got the box switch out on the back of the truck and there guys didn’t even weld it right it actually fell off and I had to pay to get it re welded. Needless to say the box truck doesn’t work after 7 months of use n I’m stuck with a truck I can’t use to make money. We are a small business n set backs like this hurts, but they could care less they got there money so they are good. Please be cautious when buying from here don’t get put in a situation like I’m in.

name: Brandon Williford
text: Great experience at AWB. Very pleased with my Isuzu truck with landscape body. Definitely use in the future for buying other trucks or parts

text: If I could give less stars I would.  This place has awful service. I would actually drive all the way to Decatur, so I don’t have to deal with this place.  Fleet pride in general has lost my business because of this place.

resp.text: I'm sorry to hear you had a bad experience with our Huntsville store. If there's anything we can do to remedy the situation please feel free to reach out at customerservice@fleetpride.com.

name: Kevin Bailey

name: Greg Cooper
text: Helped me in a bind!  Great counter sales

name: Bryan Earle
text: Friendly staff

name: Scott abandoned
text: They carry the basics for the trucking ind.

name: Melissa Sells
text: Totally outstanding

name: Marty Brady
text: So this morning we were getting ready to check out of a campground near Cartersville Ga.  We had multiple issues and called Blackhawk.  They were great to deal with over the phone, helped walk me through solutions and tonight we are in Ohio at campground heading on to Michigan home in the morning. Thanks so much for your help and I would highly recommend these guys to anyone.

name: Nathina Greco
text: I see all the reviews are over 2 years ago, please allow me to update you with a current review. I WILL SUPPLY PHOTOS AND AUDIO OF OUR CONVERSATIONS( from when I picked it up) TO PROVE EVERYTHING STATED HERE IS TRUE! I found Trey(the owner) via Facebook, I always do my research. I saw these reviews, and decided to give him a call, it was a week before memorial day weekend. I can provide all call logs, I told him I have an RV that has a lighting issue that I need checked. Considering I am a first time owner he said it may be a simple fix. I said great when may I drop it by? He said he is backed up and it would really help him out a lot if I could bring it by that Tuesday, I told him that sounds great. He asked that I send him my address and the issues via text before hand. I did. I had to work late and had my cousin drop it off. Please see the photos of our texts. I told him a million times DO NOT BUY ANYTHING for the RV I ONLY want a diagnosis. He took a week, and ended up purchasing: -LP for the RV, Checking the outside, HE BROKE the generator and told me that it stopped working. He even said on audio, it was working when you dropped it off. HE broke the battery disconnect again which was working when I dropped it off. When I went to pick it up he kept repeating how he put me in front of other projects and he needs more time. I explained how he told  me to bring it in on that day because he was behind the previous week. He said well ,.... this that...ect Please see the itemized bill of the charges and work he tried to charge me for that I specifically asked him not to do. I have no doubt he is good at working on more commercial projects,but to try and take advantage of  smaller projects is just not good business. I found another company I would recommend to anyone else who is looking for help, If you drive to him he will diagnose for free and walk the entire vehicle with you! It's Deitz Mobile RV. He does have a few different businesses so his response may be slow, but at least he is honest and up front about everything!

name: Charles Michael
text: Trey (owner)  was  100% accurate on his diagnosis  and repair of my 2002 Road Trek 190 P RV. His prices were more than fair and he stands  behind  his word...100%  !  I found a RV repair shop that I"ll be staying with a long time.

resp.text: Thank You Charles!

name: Corey Ford
text: Trey , the owner of the company does superior service and provides the very best in care for your boat or Rv, highly recommend his company.

resp.text: Thank you Corey Ford

name: Phillip Mccall
text: Fantastic experience w my rv repair. Thanks trey

name: Oli-D TV
text: Your not another face in the crowd with Trey/Blackhawk his customer service is top notch and you can tell he really cares about his customers and your boat (or camper). My new go to guy.

name: irv klayman
text: Fast turn around service 2 days very reasonable price rate highly recommend

I’ve used this company on a few repairs (the most recent was one I created) and every exchange has been professional, quick, and priced fairly. I’ve dealt with Rick each time and he’s a great guy to work with.
Five stars for me-

Steve Pierce
Coast Equipment Services

name: Victoria Edwards
text: BEWARE!!!!!! Do not buy a turbo from this place!!! We bought a turbo for $1600 dollars and 3 weeks later it went out and now they don't want to cover it with the warranty. This is the worst service I have ever received and a WASTE of money. I got children to feed.

text: I have been dealing with this company for a year and they refuse to stand by their parts- if you can get coverage for the part your lucky but you will never see a dime for labor compensation. DO NOT use them ever!!! Deal with someone who will stand beside their parts and back them with labor coverage. They are horrible to deal with!!!!!

text: They had the truck waiting on me to pick it up

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Steve!

name: Jason Allen
text: Takes for ever to get something done. People can't make appointments for breakdowns and they don't seem to be in any kind of a hurry to help get your problem solved. Also they expect some to wait in the drivers lounge while it's ok for others not to while your truck is in the shop. I can see where service is affecting sales for sure because who wants to spend a dime on a truck when you can't get the service you need when something goes wrong. But, on a positive note, the people at the Mack dealership up the road love the job you are doing Truckworx so keep it up. Their sales are through the roof.

name: Kenneth Sheppard
text: They have some of the best staff anyone could ask for. They go out of their way to make sure their customers are satisfied. They have one of the greatest parts department and shop I have ever had any dealings with. I highly recommend Truckworx Kenworth to anybody.

name: Clayton McInnis
text: Extremely quick service with last minute notice. All employees were kind and eager to help with my issues.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Clayton!

text: Great service. Nice people. Fair and efficient.

name: James Eaton
text: I was good got a chance to see some good friend

resp.text: Thanks for the great review James!

text: great group of people. they are fast and friendly.

text: Six hours for a full service and a overhead

name: Chris B

name: Marcus Pigford
text: I have been to Peach State in Georgia several times, received the best service at this location. Justin very attentive and extremely helpful. I live much closer to two other dealers but would definitely come back to this one.

resp.text:
Thank you,  Marcus. We are so glad you are a happy Peach State Truck Centers Customer and we appreciate you taking the time to share your experience in our Tuscaloosa shop and the five-star review! We'll let Justin know about your shout on the job he did for you, we always love to hear when we succeed in creating a great customer experience. We value you as our customer and thank you for your loyalty. Safe travels Marcus.

Cheers,

Alabama Freightliner & Western Star

name: Jj
text: A good place to get your truck serviced.  Good location and fast service.

name: Latiqua London
text: I Usually don’t do many reviews but these guys are awesome! I have a 26ft Box truck that they diagnosed for me and got right down to the issue! They also make you feel very comfortable at there location in Tuscaloosa. I had my 5 years old son with me who they were very kind and accommodating to. They also stayed over and helped me with an emergency issue with my Reefer. They go beyond with the effort and u understanding customers. JT and his crew are great! Service representative is also sweet! Highly recommended

resp.text:
Thank you,  Latiqua. We are so glad you are a happy Peach State Truck Centers Customer and we appreciate the five star review!

Cheers,

Alabama Freightliner & Western Star

name: Mr.Michael Hatten Sr
text: They need more mechanics because it takes to long to get the work done had my truck for 3weeks and still not fixed

resp.text:
Hi, Mr.michael Hatten, we are sorry to hear about your experience at Peach State Truck Centers in Tuscaloosa. We have reviewed our records and we can not find a truck that has been in our shop that long nor can we find any information under this name. We value our customers and would like to learn more about your situation. Can you please email us at ServicesupportRM@peachstatetrucks.com and tell us more about your experience? We look forward to hearing from you.

Thank you,

Alabama Freightliner & Western Star

name: J_ D
text: A true bunch of professionals from front to back. Called them up after they opened told them I was a couple hours away and asked if they’d be able to get me in that day when I showed up. The kind young lady in service told me they would so I hammered down. Got there and they had couple trucks in front of me that beat me in but was still told someone would look at my truck at least before they closed. 3 pm Roll Tide around and tech comes tells me to pull in front of his door. Dude was a true professional and very knowledgeable and even stayed past the time he was supposed to get off at just to get me back on the road that night. Needless to say I’m satisfied and recommend at least giving them a call. Oh ya and Roll Tide

name: Anita Russell, Bottom Line
text: We were out of work for 3 weeks for a job that we were told took a few days.  Doesn't help when we walk to our truck to see mechanics laughing and watching YouTube videos.  Worst of all...after thousands of dollars the truck broke down again. The sad thing about it this seems to be the norm when dealing with Freightliner repair shops.    This is disgrace!

resp.text:
Hi, Anita Russell, Bottom, we are sorry to hear about your experience at Peach State Truck Centers Tuscaloosa. We value our customers and would like to learn more about your situation. Can you please reach out to us with the vehicle vin number and provide more details about your experience at servicesupportRM@peachstatetrucks.com? We care about you as our customer and we would like to further assist you.

We look forward to hearing from you,

Alabama Freightliner & Western Star

name: Pastor Preston Davis
text:
Where do I start? I limped in unannounced and sat in the parking lot, read the reviews and thought OMG!!! What have I gotten myself into? Upon entering the shop I was greeted, got to the counter was greeted again, 45 minutes later my truck is in a bay, less than 2 hours repairs are made and I am beginning to think, those reviews COULD NOT have been about this location!!!! If ever I have a problem in this area and I can not limp in I WILL HAVE IT TOWED here!!! These guys were class 1 people!!! They kept me in the loop of EVERY STEP of the way. I strongly recommend Alabama Freightliner for all your truck needs
Justin at the service counter, man you ROCK!!! BUT MY FAVORITE was Bug Josh, you are the man .....THANK YALL SO MUCH FOR GETTING ME BACK ON THE ROAD....you all lived up to your motto today!!!! Super honored to have met you, again thanks a bunch.
Skywalker w/ Hawk Logistics!!!

resp.text:
Thank you,  Pastor Preston. We are so glad you are a happy Alabama Freightliner Customer and we appreciate the great review! Please reach out if we can help you again in the future.

Cheers,

Alabama Freightliner

name: Tigers Are My Totem
text: Good job!  I was seen in the  first  90 minutes for assessment and repairs were done in 1.5 days.  Definitely a good place to go for repairs

resp.text: Thank you, Tigers Are My Totem. We are so glad you are a happy Peach State Truck Centers Customer and we appreciate the five star review! We love our customers and we work super hard to keep you up and running. Thank you for trusting us. Safe travels. Cheers, Alabama Freightliner

name: Tyrone Husbands
text: Came in with at 7 am with adifferential oil leak... they got me in and out by noon. Great job and appreciate you making me a priority knowing I was under an expedited load. 5 stars to Service manager service reps and the mechanic whom I didn’t get name. Thanks

name: Todd Montana
text: They finally fixed my bunk heater. It took about 20 minutes to fix. I arrived@ 7 a.m when they opened. They finally got me in the shop by 215 p.m. I asked before 11am about waiting 4 hours and other trucks coming in after me and having their trucks serviced before me. I was told everyone had to go to lunch  They had me drop my trailer even though they didn't have to raise my truck to get to heater. I could have nosed the truck in. Before I left, I had to go back and find my hammer that was taken out of my truck. Advice to other truckers. Plan to spend most of the day there and bring your lunch and maybe supper. Check your truck before you leave for anything missing. Don't plan on driving far after spending all day there for a simple fix

name: JC WC
text: Fixed my truck in 3 hours best turn around in my 12 years of driving.

name: Walter Dean
text: Service department and their team kept me updated on the status of our truck the whole time it was down for repairs. They also went above and beyond what I expected for a large dealer repair shop. I highly recommend their services.

name: April Rodney Gibson
text: Good

resp.text:
Thank you,  April Rodney. We are so glad you are a happy Peach State Truck Centers Customer Alabama and we appreciate the great review!

Cheers,

Alabama Freightliner & Western Star

name: Chad W.
text: Going on 10yrs and my 3rd truck as an owner operator so it's safe to say I've seen my fair share of shops. I want to congratulate the whole team "apologies up front if I forget anyone" (Mary, Dalton, Justin, J.T., Josh H.) for their dedication to quality and customer service. I would and will be highly recommending this shop.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to show your appreciation of our Alabama Freightliner team, Chad! Come back any time!

name: Lone Ranger
text: The young guys could use some help on customer service skills but did a great job finding the part that I needed and had me on the road fast

name: Monique Santoyo
text: Got right in and they fixed my truck the same day! Everyone very nice. Thank you

name: Big Gene McKinney
text: Had to have my truck work on.

resp.text:
Thank you,  Big Gene. We are so glad you are a happy Peach State Truck Centers Customer and we appreciate the 5 star review! We thank you for your business.

Cheers,

Alabama Freightliner

name: Gary Wheat
text:
They were very responsive and courteous. Had to keep RV over night for parts. Had me back on road early next day.

Gary

name: Sharen Cooke Lewis
text: Poor customer service. I walked in to the counter and there was a young lady at the desk and a young man. Neither of them greeted me as a customer they just looked at each other then the guy decided to ask how could he help. Upon me picking up my part which was fairly heavy the guy sat a heavy dusty box on the counter and said alright? If a customer spends almost 500.00 at your business you could have at least carried it to the car or at least opened the door. Everyone seemed as if they didn't want to be bothered. I'll never go back unless I. Returning the part I bought.

resp.text: Hello, Sharen. I'm very sorry about the experience you had at our Tuscaloosa store. We always strive to provide the best customer service in the areas we serve. Please reach out to me at your earliest convenience so that I can see if there's anything we can do to make your next interaction with us more enjoyable. Thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback, as we are always looking for ways that we can improve in the future.

name: Joshua Schwartz (BloodPoolBoy)
text: The reviews were right. They don't even answer the phone

name: Liz Fields
text:
I was going to immediately post a review because I was so angry when we picked our RV up from them but I waited and did my research (which I should have done before I used them) and now I am posting my review. My husband and I are fulltime RV'ers so our RV is our home and my husband travels for work. So when we found out that our exhaust manifold was cracked we needed someone quickly. So without proper research we took it to these guys. They gave us a crazy estimate but was told that it was JUST an estimate, that it really depended on how hard the exhaust manifold was to remove and if any bolts broke as they were removing it. We dropped it off on a Thursday morning at 8:00 a.m. On Monday at noon my husband was informed that the parts were still not in. Then on Monday at 4:00 p.m. my husband was told that it was ready to be picked up. Since we were over an hour away we told them we would pick it up on Tuesday. My husband was also told that the final bill was $2,990.00. WHAT??? We were flabbergasted because they had told my husband that the exhaust manifold came off easy and that no bolts had broken. My husband talked to the service manager and disputed the bill but the service manager would not budge so in order to get our RV back we had to pay it. Then I did my research and talked to several other diesel mechanics and also talked with some other freightliner and cummins mechanics and was told that they seriously overcharged us for the work that is shown on the bill. The bill states the following "Pulled unit in shop. removed turbo and exhaust manifold. Cleaned the head and the turbo. Installed and torqued new exhaust manifold and turbo with all new gaskets and bolts. Cleaned inside and out. Ran unit. Checked for leaks none found. Parked unit." They charged us $175.00 an hour and claimed 14 hours worth of work for a total labor cost of $2,450.00. No mention of any problems whatsoever in removing the exhaust manifold. In my talks with other diesel mechanics I was quoted anywhere from $1,200.00 to at the most (from another freightliner mechanic) $125.00 an hour for labor. And that it should not have taken 14 hours to do the job if there had been no problems. Another mechanic I spoke with said that if the parts were not there at noon but it was finished at 4:00 then it took them at the most 4 hours to "install and torque the new manifold and turbo with all new gaskets and bolts. Clean inside and out. Run unit. Check for leaks and park the unit." That would leave 10 hours for them to remove the exhaust manifold and that is overboard, especially since there were no issues in removing it. I was given some great advice and I am pursuing this. I was told that in order to hold the Freightliner name that they have to abide by a "Labor Guide" and to ask to see it (but we had already paid and picked the RV up so I was too late in doing that) so I have requested the labor guide requirements for this type of job. I have also requested quotes from other diesel mechanics based on what they said they did via the bill. And have contacted the main Freightliner offices. It is sad that we as consumers can not completely trust that we won't be screwed when we take our property to people.
On top of all of the above, when we were ready to leave my husband asked for the key and lo and behold they had lost it. They could not find the key to our RV. Really?? What kind of business that works on vehicles loses keys? It was a good thing that we had another key with us. I would recommend to do your research before you make a quick decision like we did.

name: Scott Dockham
text: Very low key Frightliner. They did get a good price on a radiator.

name: Gerald Booker
text: Didn't greet me when walk thru door. Phones just ring while on personal phone list goes on. Worst service every @ this location but great job on my truck.

resp.text: Sorry about the customer service at our store, Gerald. Feel free to reach out to me directly to further discuss this matter. Thank you for your feedback, as we are always striving to offer the best customer service at all of our locations.

name: Kathy Morrison
text: Truck in shop from Thursday to Tuesday with DEF issues. Replaced one box and next day same issues came back. Another freightliner shop replaced the DEF sensors and problem went away. Also, closed on weekends.

name: Casey Tarantino
text: I don’t want to give them one star. They hurt us financially in the worst way. They are liars and thieves. My husband went to work for WTI in Alabama. Their repair shop is in cahoots with the Freightliner in the same town of Tuscaloosa. Just after a 90 day inspection my husband switched to WTI. They immediately on first day said there he needed over 6000.00 in repairs on his truck. We had no choice st the moment but to get it repaired where he could start work. Freightliner started repair on it. Finished it in THREE WEEKS!! So my husband was out of work for over 4 weeks due to this scam. After he was up & running again here in Pensacola we had to put it in the shop at Freightliner. After a week they found out that none of the parts had been replaced or were either old parts. It took another week to get it approved to not have to pay for the parts and labor on what was done! Then the manager in Pensacola found out that the Work was not even done by a licensed Mechanic in Tuscaloosa!!  Then of course the Pensacola Freightliner found some more things wrong of course. Like they always do. Sigh * we were out of work over 6 weeks due to this. I contacted the owner of the three Freightliner owned by him. One in Tuscaloosa and two in Atlanta area. He wouldn’t call me back at all. If we had had the money and time we would’ve had an attorney. Stay away from WTI in Tuscaloosa & FREIGHTLINER in Tuscaloosa. For the most parts there are is a lot of crookedness at Freightliners some more than others but TUSCALOOSA is the worst!! STAY AWAY!!!

name: clifton dawson
text: Fantastic place Great help

name: Nikki Autumn
text: Service was terrible absolutely no help what so ever

resp.text: Hey Nikki, can you please reach out to me directly so I get an understanding of what was unsatisfactory about your experience. Thanks for your feedback and I look forward to hearing from you. Thank you!

name: Cristina Cruz
text: Very good service, fast and friendly I recommended

resp.text: Thanks so much Cristina! Come back any time.

name: Ademir Dizdarevic
text:
If it's not an emergency don't bother coming here.

I would contact you if you give me a way to.

resp.text: Sorry you feel that way, Ademir. Please reach out to me directly if you'd like to discuss your experience further. Thank you for your feedback and I look forward to hearing from you.

name: Chuck Jones
text: Everyone was nice and helpful.good service.

name: William T Seibl
text: Way over priced, don't about your  Schedule. They did not repair my vehicle!! Left the same as came.

resp.text: Sorry about your experience at our Tuscaloosa location. Please reach out to me directly so that I can get some additional information about your case and do all that we can tot make the situation right. Thank you for your feedback and I look forward to hearing from you.

name: Kathy Hopkins
text: Long wait very long wait

name: liza dam
text: Drivers take y truck somewhere other then this bad bad bad place service is bad been waiting on my truck for 5 days, close sat head manager no help ,fine a other place for y truck, or plain to be hear 6 days slow no help😓

text: Lack of communication, waiting for no reason.

name: Liosbel Rojas
text:
(Translated by Google) Don't come to nothing, they don't have parts of anything

(Original)
Ni vengan a nada no tienen partes de nada

name: Richard Fernandez
text: My first experience with STO and they were the most helpful and friendly local business I have dealt with in a long time. They ordered my tonneau cover, called me when it came in, and even installed it too. I recommend STO and will definitely bring  my business back, thanks!

name: Timothy Beasley
text: Couldn't be happier with the customer service and the job these guys did.  My 1st experience using them but it reminded me of what old fashion customer service should be like. Customer for life as for as I'm concerned. Thanks a ton!!!

name: GARY DOSS
text: Purchase a Bed cover for my truck and a bug guard . Very good service and install . Very little wait time ...they did a great job .Very satisfied .

name: Joe F. Watson
text: Great place for truck accessories. Very accommodating.

name: Jeremy Simpson
text: Great knowledgeable staff.  Had them install a turn over plate several months back and because of their professionalism I drove all the way From PCB to have them out on my mud flaps and side steps! I’ll be back for a grille guard for sure! Would love for them to put a shop in in PCB.... not sure I’ll stay married because I’ll be broke!😂

resp.text: LOL, it was great working with you.

name: Roy Woods
text:
Friendly, professional service offering great truck upgrade products at substantially lower prices than other known locations. Superb customer service by Danny, John, Cody, Don and technical team!!
Highly recommend!!

name: Frankie Clark
text: Great company. I recently was looking for WeatherTech floor liners, and online they have an $18 shipping fee. I decided instead to look around for them. I went to Southern Truck Outfitters and they ordered the floor liners and they came in the next day and allowed me to see how they fit in my truck before having to pay. I ended up paying less there than I would have online for the same product plus the bonus safety of getting the product through an in-person location.

name: peanut Smith
text: I highly recommend you stop by and check them out the dude at the counter went out of his way to help me

name: Jeepsalive1 katz
text: Good prices and great workmanship!!  If everywhere was like this.. the world would be a better place!!

name: Brandi Fulton
text: If I could give them a negative 5 I would. I bought a $40000 Jeep. Took it to them to put a lift kit on it. The bolts on the shocks can’t loose. Took it back and they fixed it. Turned around and bought front and back bumper. On my way home the spare tire swing open almost hitting the side of my Jeep. I have taken my Jeep back 3 times to get the rear bumper fixed and it is still messed up.

resp.text: Hi Brandi, I'm sry that this has happened, we try I best to work with and accommodate all our customers needs to the best of our abilities. I hope to work with again in the future.

name: Tim Sowell
text: Cody and the guys do an amazing job.

name: G Knox
text: Daniel and his staff are very professional, polite and they things about truck accessories and the workmanship is awesome too.

resp.text: We appreciate it!

name: Derek Kilgore
text: Whether it be from Spray in liners to custom electrical wiring....they can do it! Go see Chris or Daniel!!

name: Greg Cone
text: The guys here are great! Definitely would recommend.

name: Schlep H
text: Super nice, knowledgeable staff

name: Charles Brunner
text: Went to drop off one of our work vehicles to get a brush guard put on. They already had it there and were waiting on us. When we arrived, they took care of us right away, no wait. Their out the door price with install was cheaper than anyone else for just the brush guard by itself...Ranch Hand! While I was there, I asked if they had vent visors for my personal truck. Not only did they beat Amazon's price but had them in stock right then! I will definitely be back, excellent customer service without trying to oversell or push products on you!

resp.text: Thank you so much it was great working with you. I hope to see you agian

name: Ronald Money
text: Found truck bed mat cheaper than online prices!

name: Froze 1990
text: Awesome place and they did a great job on my bed liner!

resp.text: We appreciate you letting us work with you

name: John Beach Sr
text: Only place I will shop John is superb  they all go out of their  way , awsome service and prices I will never go anywhere else

resp.text: Thank you so much for working with us

name: Blessed Nomad

resp.text: You are great to work with too.

name: Bibbit J
text: Fast friendly service

name: Dewayne Kennedy
text: Best place in Dothan to get a bed liner.  I recommend them to every truck customer I have.  They have put in several for me over the past 4 years and I have never had a customer complain about the Linex product.

resp.text: We enjoy you sending us customers. Thank you for the support

name: ron montefusco
text: Never really understood what truck outfitting is. That is, until I bought an old used pickup. There's things you need to do to it to tailor it to your uses, that's where these fine people come in. I've added a bed mat, a tonneau cover and step bars. Put them on one at a time, as I realized what I needed. I was treated as if I come in with a new Ford F-350 even though it was just an old Titan. Thanks guys, my truck fits my needs now! Would recommend this organization to everybody!

name: Captain Stehle
text: They do very professional work here.  The staff is knowledgeable and friendly.  Price are consistent unlike some places you will visit.  They treat women just as fairly as men which also unlike some other places in the auto industry.  There linex service is unmatched.  They are slightly higher on prices, but for the quality of workmanship and service it is worth a few extra dollars.  They stand behind there work 100%.

name: James Wyatt
text: Poor craftsmanship and they don't stand behind their work. Multiple issues at both the Dothan and Enterprise locations. Don't plan to go back.

name: Gary Mcallister
text: Reasonable prices. Friendly staff

resp.text: And you are great too

text: Great guys and service.

resp.text: We always try to help

text: Was broke down at the Pilot truck stop with a starter issue. I called them,they had the correct starter. After paying over the phone, he had it delivered to me. Ty very much for helping me out.
